title: Heera and Pachala Haaram - Diamond and Emerald Grand Necklace
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (approximately 15.30 carats total diamond weight)

Six Rubies (approximately 21.12 carats total weight) and Eleven Emeralds (approximately 16.34 carats total weight) and drop Emeralds (39). High clarity and excellent cut diamonds are used. The gold is finished with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a rich lustre.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases intricate floral designs crafted using micro-pavé diamond settings. The central pendant features a large, square-cut emerald surrounded by a halo of diamonds, with emerald drops dangling from the design. The necklace portion features leaf-shaped emerald drops adding a touch of natural elegance. Inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewellery designs but given a modern twist with the diamond setting.
colors: accented by the rich green of the emeralds and the deep red of rubies. The color combination is a classic South Indian palette
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions such as weddings (muhurtham)
and other significant celebrations where a statement piece is desired. Also suitable for formal events and gatherings where you want to showcase timeless elegance.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless beauty. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and rubies in a traditional design makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The quality of the gemstones and the meticulous detailing in the setting ensure a stunning and durable jewel. Possessing this piece is not just owning jewelry; it's owning a piece of South Indian heritage.
